item.title: About Us
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Ab

Out

Segovia is a Creative Agency & Startup Studio that provides Digital Products and Services turns to focus on client success. We specialize in user interface design, including front-end development which we consider to be an integral part.

1

OUR VALUES

The systematic investigation into & study materials and sources order to establish facts and reach new.

2

ACHIVEMENTS

Grow or cause to grow and become more mature, advanced, or elaborate. start to exist, experience, or possess.

Let's Talk

Segovia started out managing our SEO efforts, but their scientific approach to digital marketing and the results they have achieved made it an easy decision for us to handover the management.

Amy Reid Web Developer

Segovia digital agency is extension of marketing team, assisted the development, tracking, analysis of our digital campaigns that have yielded return on investment.

Howard Fuller Product Manager

Working with Segovia digital agency to support our organic and paid social media activity has extended the marketing activities we are able to achieve platform has made collaboration easy.

James Faulkner Product Manager

I would highly recommend Segovia Digital. I worked with the team on an animation for our Click & Collect service. This team is different from any other agency I have worked with in the past.

Diana Thomas Product Manager

N
Nicozi Lana

Developer

M
Mark Henry

Design Lead

J
James Anderson

Web Designer

E
Evelyn Alvarado

Graphic Designer

Aw

Ards

We do everything for our clients, people, and partners, not to win awards. But its nice to be seen for growing our exclusive companies, doing great work, and being one of the best places to build a career in consulting.

Newsletter

item.title: About Me
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
HE

LLO

Im Sandra, im Designer and writer WORKING in SEGOVIA agency & LIVING in Switzerland.

BRANDING

Completely synergize resource taxing relationships via premier niche markets services.

UI/UX DESIGN

The process in which products & solutions are designed to center the human.

Illustration

One of the most oversimplified aspects behind the process of creating a logo.

My

Skill

An creative and independent graphic designer. While graphic design can sometimes feel like a brand new industry, its actually quite the opposite.

Branding

78%

UI/UX DESIGN

90%

ILLUSTRATION

85%

Newsletter

item.title: Services
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Play

Ser

Vices

Branding

Completely synergize resource taxing relationships via premier niche markets services.

Illustration

One of the most oversimplified aspects behind the process of creating a logo.

UI/UX DESIGN

The process in which products & solutions are designed to center the human.

Packaging

Creating a unique name and image for a product in the consumers mind.

10+

Years of Experience

56

Best Design Awards

32K

Served Customers

48K

Launched Projects

Cli

Ents

Segovia started out managing our SEO efforts, but their scientific approach to digital marketing and the results they have achieved made it an easy decision for us to handover the management.

Amy Reid Web Developer

Segovia digital agency is extension of marketing team, assisted the development, tracking, analysis of our digital campaigns that have yielded return on investment.

Howard Fuller Product Manager

Working with Segovia digital agency to support our organic and paid social media activity has extended the marketing activities we are able to achieve platform has made collaboration easy.

James Faulkner Product Manager

I would highly recommend Segovia Digital. I worked with the team on an animation for our Click & Collect service. This team is different from any other agency I have worked with in the past.

Diana Thomas Product Manager

Apr

Oach

We love to talk with you about our unique approach. Feel free to contact us writing an email with your project idea or saying hello.

Discover More

Creative

Strategy

Experience

Wireframe

Prototyping

Technology

item.title: Polite & Attractive
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Overview

To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail. The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct acting from inner necessity. The creative mind plays with the objects it loves. Being inexhaustible, life and nature are a constant stimulus for a creative mind. The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers.
Live on
www.segovia.com
Email us
mail@segovia.com
Client
Kathryn Jones
Location
San Francisco, USA
Work
Ui/UX DESIGN, product design, App design
Categories

item.content:encoded:
Overview

To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail. The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct acting from inner necessity. The creative mind plays with the objects it loves. Being inexhaustible, life and nature are a constant stimulus for a creative mind.

item.title: Creativity Demand
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Overview

To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail. The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct acting from inner necessity. The creative mind plays with the objects it loves. Being inexhaustible, life and nature are a constant stimulus for a creative mind. The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers.
Live on
www.segovia.com
Email us
mail@segovia.com
Client
Vincent Hayes
Location
LOS ANGELS, USA
Work
Ui/UX DESIGN, product design, App design
Categories
Product Design

CHALLENGE

One of the biggest and most famous graphic design companies in the world to collaborating on Adobes packaging and identity whom are leaders in the portfolio design industry.

Solution

It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge. The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers but it takes a very creative mind to spot wrong questions.

item.title: Blast From The Past
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
CRAFTS

& DESIGN

Segovia is a Creative Agency & Startup Studio that provides Digital Products and Services turns to focus on client success. We specialize in user interface design, including front-end development which we consider to be an integral part. Limitations bring out the best in a situation, which is why we keep Small Studio a nimble little setup. Team members are by necessity highly experienced, skilled, confident and innovative.

Overview

To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail. The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct acting from inner necessity. The creative mind plays with the objects it loves. Being inexhaustible, life and nature are a constant stimulus for a creative mind. The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers, but it takes a very creative mind to spot wrong questions. It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge. The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers, but it takes a very creative mind to spot wrong questions.
Call Us
(+1) 234 5679 000
Email us
mail@segovia.com
Live on
www.segovia.com
Client
Gloria Riley
Location
LOS ANGELS, USA
Work
Ui/UX DESIGN, product design, App design
Categories
BrandingProduct Design

CHALLENGE

One of the biggest and most famous graphic design companies in the world to collaborating on Adobes packaging and identity whom are leaders in the portfolio design industry.

Solution

It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge. The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers.

item.content:encoded:
Cli

Ents

Segovia is a Creative Agency & Startup Studio that provides Digital Products and Services turns to focus on client success. We specialize in user interface design, including front-end development which we consider to be an integral part

Limitations bring out the best in a situation, which is why we keep Small Studio a nimble little setup with confident and innovative.

Segovia started out managing our SEO efforts, but their scientific approach to digital marketing and the results they have achieved made it an easy decision…

Amy Reid Web Developer

Segovia digital agency is extension of marketing team, assisted the development, tracking, analysis of our digital campaigns that have yielded return on investment.

Howard Fuller Product Manager

Working with Segovia digital agency to support our organic and paid social media activity has extended the marketing activities we are able to achieve platform…

James Faulkner Product Manager

I would highly recommend Segovia Digital. I worked with the team on an animation for our Click & Collect service. This team is different from…

Diana Thomas Product Manager

item.title: Password Protected
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Overview

To create something exceptional, your mindset must be relentlessly focused on the smallest detail. The creation of something new is not accomplished by the intellect but by the play instinct acting from inner necessity. The creative mind plays with the objects it loves. Being inexhaustible, life and nature are a constant stimulus for a creative mind. The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers.
Live on
www.segovia.com
Email us
mail@domain.com
Client
John n. Hendrick
Location
LOS ANGELS, USA
Work
Ui/UX DESIGN, product design, App design
Categories
Product Design

CHALLENGE

One of the biggest and most famous graphic design companies in the world to collaborating on Adobes packaging and identity whom are leaders in the portfolio design industry.

Solution

It is the supreme art of the teacher to awaken joy in creative expression and knowledge. The uncreative mind can spot wrong answers but it takes a very creative mind to spot wrong questions.

item.title: Home V2
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Research

Completely synergize resource taxing relationships via premier niche markets.

Design

It is a process in which technology products and solutions are designed.

Build

Creating a unique name and image for a product in the consumers mind.

Success

One of the biggest and most famous graphic design companies in the world.

Segovia started out managing our SEO efforts, but their scientific approach to digital marketing and the results they have achieved made it an easy decision for us to handover the management.

Amy Reid Web Developer

Segovia digital agency is extension of marketing team, assisted the development, tracking, analysis of our digital campaigns that have yielded return on investment.

Howard Fuller Product Manager

Working with Segovia digital agency to support our organic and paid social media activity has extended the marketing activities we are able to achieve platform has made collaboration easy.

James Faulkner Product Manager

I would highly recommend Segovia Digital. I worked with the team on an animation for our Click & Collect service. This team is different from any other agency I have worked with in the past.

Diana Thomas Product Manager

Were Segovia, We do what you need.

A interface is not overly complex, but instead is straightforward, providing quick access to common features or commands.

There are endless lists of customization which every process provides and it can be surely endless.

Limitations bring out the best in a situation,which is why we keep Small Studio a nimble little setup.

Process of creating websites. It includes layout, content & graphic design. The branch of knowledge. N

item.title: Plant Box
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The Plant Box and Side Table from Danish design house Ferm Living combines a contemporary aesthetic with a multi-functional design. Suitable for use all around the home, the plant box/side table is ideal for storage, flowers, plants, stationery, home accessories, toys, books or magazines. Elegant in design, it features a contrasting rectangular box on top of narrow metal legs, offering a stylish and useful home accessory.
item.excerpt:encoded: Part of the Green Home collection the round Plant Box welcomes an organic expression into the home. It preserves the clean lines and sleek look of the Plant Box, but the round box gives you more space for more or larger pots.

item.title: Floor Lamp
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The floor lamp by segovia pendant lamps while being at the same time a stand alone design piece. Here, the series' hallmark, the conical metal shade with high-gloss lacquer finish, is combined with a matt lacquered slender metal stem and a round base. The shade itself can be tilted by 40 degrees to provide direct light for reading and working. At the same time an exciting asymmetrical look is achieved. Caravaggio is optionally available in black or white, while the opaque shade is always lacquered white on the inside to maximize the light's brilliance.
item.excerpt:encoded: Floor lamp segovia outstands with its clear shape: the matt lacquered structure contrasts with the glossy conical shade that can be tilted by 40 degrees. In black or white.

item.title: TABLE LAMP
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Turn the disc to switch the lamp on or off, or use it as a dimmer. Because of the hidden LED bulb which reflect the light into the hollow disc, the table lamp creates a soft and cozy light perfect for small nooks and crannies. Perfect for your windowsill or on your bedside table.
item.excerpt:encoded: As with all PWTBS designs, tactile interaction is key. The soft light from the hidden LED bulb reflects off the inside of the bowl. Just tilt her face to turn her on or off, brighter or dim.

item.title: Tea Cup
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded:
Enjoy tea between tradition and future with Cup by segovia. The Theo tea cup with coaster leans on Asian culture with attractive style and powerful expression. The tea collection by segovia has all to offer, whats needed for a real tea ceremony.
The Theo tea cups spread quietness to the eyes and the soul. As well as the suitable teapot with the same Asian inspired, simple design, the mug also consists of rustic, black-brown stoneware. The cups are also suitable for Miso soup, Edamame beans or Wakame salad.
item.excerpt:encoded: The Theo tea mug is made of blackish-brown stoneware, in the same style as the simple, Scandinavian, clean lines of the teapot. The mug has a bamboo coaster, which adds a warm, tranquil touch. Avoid cup rings on the table with this sustainable, Asian bamboo coaster.

item.title: Hammer Armchair
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: The Hammerlounge chair is available with a low or high back, thus fulfilling synergistic needs. Its variety makes it perfect for any environment, from contract to home, from hotel room to meeting room. . . elegant in every situation.
item.excerpt:encoded: A die-cast aluminum element joins the front legs and circular structure; a detail that for its originality and appeal inspires the name of the collection.

item.title: Lampshade
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Your lamp must have a harp or bulb clamp adapter to assemble the lampshade. Please make sure it is clear before purchase, otherwise it will not be assembled.DEMENSION LAMPSHADE:5 inch top diameter,9 inch bottom diameter,7 inch tall; 0.27 inch screw thread diameter.
item.excerpt:encoded: The color is natural, leaving your bedroom and living room decorated with natural comfort.

item.title: WALLCLOCK
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: MADE OF NATURAL WOOD AND ENGINEERED WOOD. Clock hands are made of natural wood and Clock Face is made of Engineered Wood ""FORESCOLOR"" FORESCOLOR is non-toxic and resistant to moisture and has excellent color-fastness".Simple and Modern Design will look beautiful in any room. It will match all of your dcor in your home and office.
item.excerpt:encoded: Being Handmade, Some Variation In Dimension, Design, Shade Or Color Is Natural. In Fact, These Variations Bestow The Charm, Character And Authenticity To The Creations.

item.title: kastehelmi Bowl
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: New Stylish And Elegant, This Glass Set From Afast Will Heighten The Look of Your Personal Use. New Designed With Royal Look, These Glasses Should Be Handled With Care And Are Suitable For Serving Alcoholic And Non-Alcoholic Drinks To Your Guests. This Glass Set Is Also An Ideal Gifting Option For Various Occasions. It Is Dishwasher Safe And Made From Lime Soda So Always Hygeinic And Safe For Your Love One.
item.excerpt:encoded: Bowls looking beautiful Designed, This Glass Bowl Set Of From Megalite Is A Wonderful Addition To Your Glassware Collection.

item.title: Joa Stool
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: seat cushion in anti-combustion high resilience polyurethane foam (37 kg/m3) + anti-combustion agglomerated foams (230 kg/m3 and 50 kg/m3). Comfort layer in 110 g/m2 polyester quilting.
item.excerpt:encoded: shell in natural or anthracite-stained beech veneered multi-ply. Sheet steel + pannels of spruce multi-ply beneath seat cushion.

item.title: Decor Pouf
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Segovia Knitted Pouf is the perfect addition to your living room, bedroom or kids room! Pair with your favorite couch or chair to make them even more comfortable while you read, watch tv, play games, visit, or nap! The beautiful hand-woven cotton design adds a Morricone vibe to your home while providing a functional piece of furniture. The pouf is made of woven cotton with a bean bag middle section. The lightweight design allows you to easily move the pouf whenever needed. The pouf is also great seating for kids who often love being near the floor playing! They also provide a great spot for kids to sit while playing video games, watching tv or reading. Once they are done using them easily move them into a closet or in the corner of the room!
item.excerpt:encoded: Our compact pouf gives you a comfortable foot stool without getting in the way. Great way to make your couch or chair even more comfortable with added foot stool for support

item.title: Wall Lampshade
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Give your home increased touch of sophistication and class with this unique and stylish looking product from Aesthetics. Increase the sophistication levels of your home with this antique themed chandelier, which has been designed with the whole old world charm and theme to give a unique touch to your interiors. The product comes with beautiful set of 8 lamps which reflect light to add a surreal effect to your interiors. The brand has designed this product with ingenuity, therefore the lamps add a surreal look to your dcor. The product has a Brass body with Lacquer Polish to make it RUST RESISTANT and will remain the same for many years. It is easy to maintain and easy to clean.
item.excerpt:encoded: Segovia preasent a new decorative home & hall lamp light Setting up this wall light in your place, not only keeps the surroundings thoroughly illuminated but also puts the accent on the decor of your place.

item.title: Fan Stool
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Each of the item is hand crafted by the finest artisans from Jaipur. Wood grain, color variance, texture changes and knots are all part of the charm of the product and may, hence, vary from item to item. Please read the description careful and sure while placing the order for furniture as these are made to order products. Every piece is specially manufactured for our esteemed customers.
item.excerpt:encoded: This stool a perfect example of mordern, elegant , durable furniture that can inahnce the beauty of home. It can be used in indoor, living room, drawing room, office, restaurant, lounge, cafe, pub etc.

item.title: Wool Cushion
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Suit For - All seasons and any style of home. Great for any age, from children to the elderly. Luxurious & comfortable, warm in the winter/cool in the summer.Environmentally friendly dyes.Our beautiful mongolian lamb fur pillow cover adds elegance and sophistication to traditional or modern dcor. Care To Wash - To clean, wash in cold water by hand or dry clea , air dry or tumble dry on low when needed. Don't bleach, don't iron , hand dry.
item.excerpt:encoded: Premium Material - Front - 100% warm and luxurious real Mongolian lamb sheepskin fur wool, each gorgeous Mongolian lamb fur pillow cover has a micro-suede backing which provides the back-faux suede,hidden zipper closure.

item.title: Diana Thomas
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: I would highly recommend Segovia Digital. I worked with the team on an animation for our Click & Collect service. This team is different from any other agency I have worked with in the past.

item.title: James Faulkner
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Working with Segovia digital agency to support our organic and paid social media activity has extended the marketing activities we are able to achieve platform has made collaboration easy.

item.title: Howard Fuller
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Segovia digital agency is extension of marketing team, assisted the development, tracking, analysis of our digital campaigns that have yielded return on investment.

item.title: Amy Reid
item.dc:creator: admin
item.content:encoded: Segovia started out managing our SEO efforts, but their scientific approach to digital marketing and the results they have achieved made it an easy decision for us to handover the management.
